title: Ottoman map, reasons for decline of empire

content.question: Which of the following best explains the changes depicted in Map 2 ?

choices.label: The rise of the Safavid Persian Empire
European imperialism and increasing ethnic nationalism
Sunni versus Shia rivalries within the Islamic world
The decline of Silk Road trade routes

content.answer: European imperialism and increasing ethnic nationalism

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
